name: Env Variables in LXC
description:
Sets environment variables in an LXC container configuration.

For each environment variable entry (key=value format, one per line), sets the environment variable in the container configuration file.

The environment variables are stored as comments in the container configuration file and can be read later if needed.

This template can be called independently of the LXC container's state (running or stopped) and is safe to call multiple times (idempotent).

parameters.name: ID of the LXC Container
parameters.description: ID of the LXC container for which environment variables will be set.

parameters.name: Environment Variables
parameters.description:
Environment variables in key=value format, one per line. Each line sets an environment variable in the container configuration. Example:
MYAPP_HOST=localhost
MYAPP_PORT=8080
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://localhost:5432/mydb

commands.description: Executes the script to set environment variables in the container configuration.
